muclient.script:
plugin_dir = GetInfo(66) .. "my_plugins\\"
background_colour = "black" im_dim = 134 im_scale = 1 dim_scaled = 0 direction = 0 b_eph_to_am = false b_is_whirpool = false win_x = 0 win_y = 0 win = GetPluginID()
function OnPluginInstall()
ColourNote("red", "", "Compass plugin installed successfully. To toggle visibility use '!compass toggle'.") end
function OnPluginSaveState()
SaveTheVars() end
function SaveTheVars()
SetVariable("background_colour", background_colour) SetVariable("im_dim", im_dim) SetVariable("im_scale", im_scale) SetVariable("dim_scaled", dim_scaled) SetVariable("win_x", win_x) SetVariable("win_y", win_y) end
function LoadTheVars()
background_colour = GetVariable("background_colour") if background_colour == nil then
background_colour = "black" end
im_dim = tonumber(GetVariable("im_dim")) if im_dim == nil then
im_dim = 134 end
im_scale = tonumber(GetVariable("im_scale")) if im_scale == nil then
im_scale = 1 end
dim_scaled = tonumber(GetVariable("dim_scaled")) if dim_scaled == nil then
dim_scaled = 0 end
win_x = tonumber(GetVariable("win_x")) if win_x == nil then
win_x = 0 end
win_y = tonumber(GetVariable("win_y")) if win_y == nil then
win_y = 0 end end
function HandleShudders(_, _, wildcards)
if wildcards[1] == "sharply " then if wildcards[2] == "port" then
direction = CircularValue(direction - 2) else direction = CircularValue(direction + 2) end else if wildcards[2] == "port" then
direction = CircularValue(direction - 1) else direction = CircularValue(direction + 1) end end UpdateDirection() end
function HandleDrift(_, _, wildcards)
if wildcards[1] == "port" then
direction = CircularValue(direction - 1) else direction = CircularValue(direction + 1) end UpdateDirection() end
function HandleSpinner(_, _, wildcards)
b_is_whirpool = true UpdateDirection() end
function HandleStart(_, _, wildcards)
if wildcards[1] == "Chidder" then
b_eph_to_am = true else b_eph_to_am = false end WindowShow(win, true) direction = 0 b_is_whirpool = false b_win_visibility = true UpdateDirection(0) end
function HandleFinish(_, _, wildcards)
WindowShow(win, false) b_is_whirpool = false b_win_visibility = false end
function HandleDirection(_, _, wildcards)
local wildcard = wildcards[1] local value = 0 if wildcard == "hubwards" then value = b_eph_to_am and 0 or 4 elseif wildcard == "widdershins-hubwards" then value = b_eph_to_am and 1 or 5 elseif wildcard == "widdershins" then value = b_eph_to_am and 2 or 6 elseif wildcard == "widdershins-rimwards" then value = b_eph_to_am and 3 or 7 elseif wildcard == "rimwards" then value = b_eph_to_am and 4 or 0 elseif wildcard == "turnwise-rimwards" then value = b_eph_to_am and 5 or 1 elseif wildcard == "turnwise" then value = b_eph_to_am and 6 or 2 elseif wildcard == "turnwise-hubwards" then value = b_eph_to_am and 7 or 3 else print("unknown direction: " .. wildcard[1]) value = 0 end
b_is_whirpool = false direction = value UpdateDirection() end
function UpdateDirection()
WindowRectOp(win, 2, 0, 0, dim_scaled, dim_scaled, ColourNameToRGB(background_colour))
if b_is_whirpool == true then
WindowTransformImage(win, "whirpool", 0, 0, 3, im_scale, 0, 0, im_scale) else WindowTransformImage(win, "compass" .. direction, 0, 0, 3, im_scale, 0, 0, im_scale) end end
-- usage currentVal = CircularValue(currentVal +/- value) function CircularValue(val)
return (val % 16) % 8 end
function ResetDirection()
b_eph_to_am = not b_eph_to_am UpdateDirection() end
function ResetPosition()
WindowPosition(win, 0, 0, 12, 0) end
function ResetHeading()
direction = 0 b_is_whirpool = false UpdateDirection() end
function SetSize(_, _, wildcards)
im_scale = tonumber(wildcards[1]) / 100 dim_scaled = im_dim * im_scale
WindowResize(win, dim_scaled, dim_scaled, ColourNameToRGB(background_colour)) UpdateDirection() end
function SetColour(_, _, wildcards)
background_colour = tostring(wildcards[1]) UpdateDirection() end
local b_win_visibility = false function ToggleWindow()
if b_win_visibility == false then
WindowShow(win, true) b_win_visibility = true UpdateDirection() else WindowShow(win, false) b_win_visibility = false end direction = 0 end
function MouseDownHotspot(flags, hotspot_id)
hs1_start_x, hs1_start_y = WindowInfo(win, 14), WindowInfo(win, 15) end
function DragMoveHotspot(flags, hotspot_id) local hs1_pos_x, hs1_pos_y = WindowInfo(win, 17), WindowInfo(win, 18)
win_x = hs1_pos_x - hs1_start_x win_y = hs1_pos_y - hs1_start_y WindowPosition(win, win_x, win_y, 0, 2);
if hs1_pos_x < 0 or hs1_pos_x > GetInfo(281) or hs1_pos_y < 0 or hs1_pos_y > GetInfo(280) then check(SetCursor(11)) else check(SetCursor(1)) end end
function MouseUpHotspot(flags, hotspot_id)
SaveTheVars() SaveState() end
function InitWindow()
LoadTheVars() if win_x == 0 and win_y == 0 then
WindowCreate(win, 0, 0, im_dim, im_dim, 12, 0, ColourNameToRGB(background_colour)) -- create window else WindowCreate(win, win_x, win_y, dim_scaled, dim_scaled, 12, 2, ColourNameToRGB(background_colour)) end
WindowLoadImage(win, "compass0", plugin_dir .. "compass0.png") WindowLoadImage(win, "compass1", plugin_dir .. "compass1.png") WindowLoadImage(win, "compass2", plugin_dir .. "compass2.png") WindowLoadImage(win, "compass3", plugin_dir .. "compass3.png") WindowLoadImage(win, "compass4", plugin_dir .. "compass4.png") WindowLoadImage(win, "compass5", plugin_dir .. "compass5.png") WindowLoadImage(win, "compass6", plugin_dir .. "compass6.png") WindowLoadImage(win, "compass7", plugin_dir .. "compass7.png") WindowLoadImage(win, "whirpool", plugin_dir .. "whirpool.png")
im_dim = WindowImageInfo(win, "compass" .. direction, 2)
UpdateDirection()
-- make a hotspot WindowAddHotspot(win, "hs1", 0, 0, im_dim, im_dim, "", -- MouseOver "", -- CancelMouseOver "MouseDownHotspot", "MouseUpHotspot", "", "", -- tooltip text 0, 0) -- hand cursor
WindowDragHandler(win, "hs1", "DragMoveHotspot", "", 0)
WindowShow (win, false) -- show it end
InitWindow()
muclient.triggers: <trigger enabled="y" keep_evaluating="y" match="^(?:Squinting up at the sun|Gazing up at the stars), you determine that the ship is heading (?<=heading )(.*?)(?=(\s|\.))" regexp="y" sequence="12" script="HandleDirection" name="ShipDirection" >
